title: An error is reported when deploying devnet
body:
When I do the following
```
./prysmctl testnet generate-genesis --num-validators=64 --output-ssz=./consensus/genesis.ssz --chain-config-file=./consensus/config.yml --override-eth1data=true
```
The following error occurs
```
INFO[0000] No genesis time specified, defaulting to now()  prefix=genesis
INFO[0000] Specified a chain config file: config.yml     prefix=genesis
ERRO[0000] Failed to decode hex string.                  error="encoding/hex: invalid byte: U+000D"
ERRO[0000] Failed to decode hex string.                  error="encoding/hex: invalid byte: U+000D"
ERRO[0000] Failed to decode hex string.                  error="encoding/hex: invalid byte: U+000D"
FATA[0000] Could not generate beacon chain genesis state  error="could not set config params: config name=interop conflicts with existing config named=mainnet: configset cannot add config with conflicting fork version schedule" prefix=genesis
```
My config.yml configuration is as follows
```
CONFIG_NAME: interop
PRESET_BASE: interop

# Genesis
GENESIS_FORK_VERSION: 0x20000089

# Altair
ALTAIR_FORK_EPOCH: 2
ALTAIR_FORK_VERSION: 0x20000090

# Merge
BELLATRIX_FORK_EPOCH: 4
BELLATRIX_FORK_VERSION: 0x20000091
TERMINAL_TOTAL_DIFFICULTY: 43351567

# Time parameters
SECONDS_PER_SLOT: 4
SLOTS_PER_EPOCH: 4

# Deposit contract
DEPOSIT_CONTRACT_ADDRESS: 0xDDdDddDdDdddDDddDDddDDDDdDdDDdDDdDDDDDDd
```

### reference documents
https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/issues/11676
https://docs.prylabs.network/docs/advanced/proof-of-stake-devnet
https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/issues/12122
